attributes.action: Support Russell Brand, and Help Bring Him Back on the Radio
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that Russell Brand is a comedy genius. We believe that the British public should not be denied the laughter and happiness he brings, just because everyone does not find him funny all of the time. He has apologised to Andrew Sachs, now lets put this episode behind us, and let Brand get on with doing what he does best, making people laugh.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
